name: Meowland
description:
STORY

A strange island suddenly apear around earth : Meowland. People from this one teleport you and your sister in their space haven. During the process you own a curious power: You are now able to Create and Destroy. You are lost but confident to find out a way to "Back to Earth".

CONTROLS/REQUIREMENTS
  • WASD - move
  • MOUSE - Look
  • SPACE - Jump
  • LEFT MOUSE CLICK - User Creation/Destruction power
  • ESCAPE - Open menu

    Our game is designed to work with local network (Each player with their computer)
    And this require 2 players in cooperation
CREDITS

    3D Artist/Level Artist

    2D Artist

    Programmer/Level Designer
